column4: Hi there... is there someone that can help me wint x-chat version 2.4.1?
shoot
: Since I don't know when... all my dcc connection appear in the current channel... like notice
yes that is true
i can't find the option to change that
: how can I put it back in a new tab?
maybe in the Tab section of preferences, Open utilities in Tabs? not sure tho
: Okay... I've check everywhere ... no idea where the config could be.... anybody know where I can find that?
: nope... still dosen't work.....
not sure it can be done
: it was working before... I don't know what I done to broke it... but I'm sure it was working... so dumb I am!
its always been like that here
: really??? humm... maybe I mix thing with windows....
i've asked a friend, he doesn't know either. He says that he uses kde's window controller to prevent it from stealing focus, but i don't know what else you could do
: Okay.... thanks for your help... I least I will not waste my time on that non existent problem :)
its really annoying tho, maybe worth filing a bug if it doesn't already exist
: It was working on previous release?
you could try this: prefs/interface/tabs focus new tabs/never
: it dosen't work ... but forget it... I will live with that :)
i'm asking in #xchat
: okay!
it is: settings > preferences > tabs > open utilities in > TAB
have tested and it works
: try to dcc chat me
